ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Definatly getting to old I d assume. =) ********************** Human Cleric Ramsess De Vizier Rallos Zek ... From: I.G  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Definatly getting to old I'd assume. =)

**********************
Human Cleric
Ramsess De'Vizier
Rallos Zek
**********************


----- Original Message -----
From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 8:49 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Weapons


> From: I.G <shadowtg1@...>
>
> ok I am not writing this to bash any one person or anything but...
>
> what the hell is up with the damn kewl shit??? what we cant spell any
more?
> I admit I have trouble spelling at times but this just really looks
stupid!
>
> maybe I am just getting old or something.
>
> Jaxim
>
>
> >From: "Kris Becan" <phonic@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Weapons
> >Date: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 14:49:57 -0500
> >
> >Ok guys I know I may be going off on the weapons here but my thought is
> >that there are no really kewl Cleric only weapons in the game. I know
this
> >is ranting but hear me out. I know we aren't fighters but we are
defensive
> >players in the game. Why not give us a few defensive weapons. Weapons
with
> >random charges of some type of defensive spell. I know ya'll will all say
> >well what about the screaming mace? Blah it does a whole lot of good for
> >you when your not even supposed to be tanking right? Anyway, why not have
> >that cast as an area affect yaulp? That would be much kewler and much
more
> >beneficial to the group. What do all of ya'll think about something like
> >that? I'm not saying that the clerics in general are unbalanced in the
game
> >but what I'm saying is there are weapons that are class specific to most
> >other classes but the clerics. Please give me your feedback. Please feel
> >free to rant right back at me to... just don't be too harsh! :)
> >
> >**********************
> >Human Cleric
> >Ramsess De'Vizier
> >Rallos Zek
> >**********************
>
